name: Parkour Movement Demo
description:
W - Move forward

A - Move left

S - Move back

D - Move right

Space - Jump

Ctrl - Crouch (slide at high speeds)

Hold Space + Ctrl - High jump

Right Click - Slow Time (costs resources)

Left Click - Grapple (can only be used on green cubes)

Esc - Pause

R - Restart

https://github.com/OrigamiJoji/ParkourMovement
